column4: urgent!: my wifi nic works when i'm at home in my own lan, but when i boot up at say, the cybercafe i'm in right now -- my laptop doesn't even see the card
can anyone help me fix it?
what's different about your setup at home to in the cafe, apart from the fact that it's plugged in somewhere else, and are you positive the card isn't seen?
kakipukul: it is not detected by the computer.
network-admin > ifconfig doesn't show my wireless nic
what's the output of "ifconfig -a |grep Ethernet" (stick it on pastebin.com)
i recieve eth0  Link encap: ethernet Hwaddr: my mac address
*njan: that is my integrated ethernet nic though (i'm currently wired into the router directly).. it doesn't list anything besides eth0, no
what happens if you unplug and replug the wireless card?
the card lights up appropriately, but the laptop doesn't detect it
*njan: if i go into 'device manager' it does show up as an unknown device under the pcicardbus
